title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 54.21 - Requirements for approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 54.21 - Requirements for approval

State Regulations

No wind screen shall be used unless the visual material
meets the requirements set forth in Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards of
49 Code of Federal Regulation standard 571.205 Glazing

Materials. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
54.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
